description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军中将，后追晋为陆军二级上将。在八二三砲战中殉职。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the Republic of China Army, posthumously promoted to the rank of full general. He was killed in action during the 1958 Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Zhao Jiaxiang.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧的逝世地。
description.en: The place of death of Zhao Jiaxiang.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧所属的政党。
description.en: The political party to which Zhao Jiaxiang belonged.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1925年至1947年间的国家军队。
description.en: The national army of the Republic of China from 1925 to 1947.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的陆上武装部队。
description.en: The ground branch of the Republic of China Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领的军衔，赵家骧被追晋为此衔。
description.en: A military rank for generals in the Republic of China Armed Forces, to which Zhao Jiaxiang was posthumously promoted.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国军将领的军衔。
description.en: A military rank for generals in the Republic of China Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 国共内战期间国民政府在东北地区的军事指挥机构。
description.en: The military command structure of the Nationalist Government in Northeast China during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部下属的陆军最高指挥机构。
description.en: The highest command authority for the army under the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军的军团之一。
description.en: One of the army corps of the Republic of China Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军在金门地区的防卫指挥机构。
description.en: The defense command structure of the Republic of China Army in the Kinmen area.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期北洋军阀中直系和奉系两大派系为争夺北京政府统治权而爆发的战争。
description.en: Wars in the early Republic of China between the Zhili and Fengtian cliques of the Beiyang warlords for control of the Beiyang government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国与大日本帝国之间发生的战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 1958年发生于金门及其周边的一场战役，赵家骧在此战役中殉职。
description.en: A 1958 conflict that took place in and around Kinmen, during which Zhao Jiaxiang was killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋军阀直系首领。
description.en: A leading figure in the Zhili clique of Beiyang warlords in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期的北洋军阀派系之一。
description.en: One of the Beiyang warlord cliques in the early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 东北军官队的主持人，曾是赵家骧的上级。
description.en: The head of the Northeast Officers' Team, who was once Zhao Jiaxiang's superior.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧曾在此受训的军事单位。
description.en: A military unit where Zhao Jiaxiang was trained.

description.zh-cn: 中国东北地区的军事院校，赵家骧毕业于此。
description.en: A military academy in Northeast China from which Zhao Jiaxiang graduated.

description.zh-cn: 东北讲武堂教官，曾推荐赵家骧。
description.en: An instructor at the Northeast Military Academy who recommended Zhao Jiaxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，赵家骧的岳父及早期上级。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, Zhao Jiaxiang's father-in-law and early superior.

description.zh-cn: 楚溪春之女，赵家骧的夫人。
description.en: Daughter of Chu Xichun and wife of Zhao Jiaxiang.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军统一广东的军事行动。
description.en: The military campaigns by the National Revolutionary Army to unify Guangdong province.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军为统一中国而进行的军事行动。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the National Revolutionary Army to unify China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，赵家骧曾在其麾下任职。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, under whom Zhao Jiaxiang served.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，赵家骧曾在其麾下任职。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, under whom Zhao Jiaxiang served.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，赵家骧曾在其麾下任职。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, under whom Zhao Jiaxiang served.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府针对中国共产党的军事围剿行动。
description.en: Military encirclement campaigns launched by the Nationalist Government against the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧曾任参谋主任的国民革命军部队。
description.en: A unit of the National Revolutionary Army where Zhao Jiaxiang served as chief of staff.

description.zh-cn: 军衔之一。
description.en: A military rank.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国大陆时期的军事院校，赵家骧毕业于此。
description.en: A military academy during the mainland period of the Republic of China, from which Zhao Jiaxiang graduated.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧在陆军大学的同学。
description.en: Zhao Jiaxiang's classmate at the Army University.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的建制单位之一。
description.en: One of the constituent units of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的建制单位之一。
description.en: One of the constituent units of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，赵家骧曾在其麾下参与武汉保卫战。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, under whom Zhao Jiaxiang participated in the Defense of Wuhan.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争中的一场重要战役。
description.en: A major battle during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧曾任少将大队长的军事训练单位。
description.en: A military training unit where Zhao Jiaxiang served as major general and battalion commander.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的建制单位之一。
description.en: One of the constituent units of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，与赵家骧关系甚好。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who had a good relationship with Zhao Jiaxiang.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争后国民政府在东北设立的军事机构。
description.en: A military organization established by the Nationalist Government in Northeast China after the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治及军事人物，曾主政东北，是赵家骧的上级。
description.en: A political and military figure of the Republic of China who once governed Northeast China and was Zhao Jiaxiang's superior.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧曾任处长的军事训练单位。
description.en: A military training unit where Zhao Jiaxiang served as director.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，赵家骧曾在其麾下任职。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, under whom Zhao Jiaxiang served.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第一届国民大会的代表，赵家骧曾当选。
description.en: A delegate to the First National Assembly of the Republic of China, a position to which Zhao Jiaxiang was elected.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

en: Ministry of National Defense (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国防事务主管机关。
description.en: The cabinet-level agency in charge of defense affairs of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部长，金门炮战时在场但幸免于难。
description.en: Minister of National Defense of the Republic of China, who was present but survived the shelling during the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部司令，赵家骧的上级。
description.en: Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command and Zhao Jiaxiang's superior.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部副司令官，在金门炮战中与赵家骧一同殉职。
description.en: Deputy commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, who was killed in action alongside Zhao Jiaxiang during the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 金门防卫司令部副司令官，在金门炮战中与赵家骧一同殉职。
description.en: Deputy commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, who was killed in action alongside Zhao Jiaxiang during the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、书法家，赵家骧的好友。
description.en: A politician and calligrapher of the Republic of China, and a good friend of Zhao Jiaxiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家最高监察机关。
description.en: The highest supervisory body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的大学，赵家骧夫人楚瑞延的母校。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Zhao Jiaxiang's wife, Chu Ruiyan.

position.en: Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧在金门炮战中遭炮击殉职。
description.en: Zhao Jiaxiang was killed by artillery fire during the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧早年曾是吴佩孚招收的幼年兵，隶属于直系军队。
description.en: In his early years, Zhao Jiaxiang was a boy soldier recruited by Wu Peifu, belonging to the Zhili clique's army.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧在东北军官队受训时，朱继先是该队的主持人。
description.en: When Zhao Jiaxiang was training at the Northeast Officers' Team, Zhu Jixian was its head.

description.zh-cn: 金海峰是赵家骧在东北讲武堂的教官。
description.en: Jin Haifeng was Zhao Jiaxiang's instructor at the Northeast Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 金海峰推荐赵家骧到楚溪春的军中任职。
description.en: Jin Haifeng recommended Zhao Jiaxiang to serve in Chu Xichun's army.

description.zh-cn: 邀请赵家骧进入第二军担任少将参谋长。
description.en: Invited Zhao Jiaxiang to join the Second Army as Major General Chief of Staff.

description.zh-cn: 两人是陆军大学同学。
description.en: They were classmates at the Army University.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧作为十一军团参谋长参与了武汉保卫战。
description.en: Zhao Jiaxiang participated in the Defense of Wuhan as the Chief of Staff of the 11th Army Group.

description.zh-cn: 两人关系甚好。
description.en: They had a very good relationship.

description.zh-cn: 1945年，赵家骧随杜聿明出任东北保安司令部参谋长。
description.en: In 1945, Zhao Jiaxiang followed Du Yuming to serve as the Chief of Staff of the Northeast Security Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军于1958年8月23日对金门发动炮击，引发金门炮战。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army launched an artillery bombardment on Kinmen on August 23, 1958, triggering the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 章杰在金门炮战中遭炮击殉职。
description.en: Zhang Jie was killed by artillery fire during the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 吉星文在金门炮战中遭炮击殉职。
description.en: Ji Xingwen was killed by artillery fire during the Second Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 赵家骧任金门防卫司令部副司令官时，胡琏是司令官。
description.en: When Zhao Jiaxiang was the Deputy Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, Hu Lian was the Commander.

description.zh-cn: 胡琏作为金门防卫司令官，是国防部长俞大维的下级。
description.en: As the Commander of the Kinmen Defense Command, Hu Lian was a subordinate of the Minister of National Defense, Yu Ta-wei.

description.zh-cn: 于右任是赵家骧的好友。
description.en: Yu Youren was a good friend of Zhao Jiaxiang.
